name: snowman with a bird ornament
notes:
this crochet pattern is for a christmas ornament that features a snowman's face with a little bird sitting on his carrot nose. for the bird, i used a small craft button.

yarn: worsted weight #4 cotton yarn, crochet thread size 10.

crochet hooks: 4.5 mm, 4/2.00 mm

finished size: about 4-3/4‚Äù in diameter

skill level: intermediate

the pattern uses crochet us terms.

free version of this pattern is available on my website: https://www.goldenlucycrafts.com/snowman-with-bird-crochet-pattern/
by purchasing a pdf file, you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly, styled, and advertisement-free pdf file format.
